name: markdown-table-extractor
description: Parse GitHub-flavored Markdown tables into structured JSON (UMD bundle)

scripts.copy-to-public: rm -rf ../../public/markdown-table-extractor && mkdir -p ../../public/markdown-table-extractor && cp index.html ../../public/markdown-table-extractor/index.html && cp dist/markdown-table-extractor.js ../../public/markdown-table-extractor/markdown-table-extractor.js

author: Jeremy He
